CustomField.description: Controls whether user messages are screened for harmful content before being sent to the LLM. Standard uses the provider's built-in safety determination (e.g. OpenAI Moderation API flagged boolean). Off disables all checks.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Standard: screens messages using the provider's native safety thresholds and blocks harmful content. Off: disables all prompt safety checks.
CustomField.label: Prompt Safety Level
